title: Like Father Like Daughter
description: Like Father Like Daughter is a collection of short stories wriiten by J.S. Wilsoncroft, also featuring a story written by her father, Jim Johnston. His story, The Landlubbers is about a men 's fishing expedition gone wrong----it was taken over by the wives. J.S.'s stories feature a romance, an angel story and a horror story that will make you cringe.
author: J.S. Wilsoncroft
